replies.user_spaceship_life_support_ask_help: We need your help. The life support is failing!
replies.spaceship_ask_lock_manufacturer: Please provide the name of the lock manufacturer.
replies.spaceship_ask_colour_top_cable: Please provide the color of the top cable.
replies.user_spaceship_life_support_inform_top_c: The colour of the top cable is [COLOUR]
replies.spaceship_ask_colour_second_cable: Please provide the color of the second cable.
replies.user_spaceship_life_support_inform_secon: The colour of the second cable is [COLOUR]
replies.db_spaceship_inform_outcome: [RESULT] APIName = spaceship_life_support ; Message = Successful! Life support was recovered. ;
replies.anything_else: Is there anything else that I can do for you?
replies.spaceship_inform_nothing_found: Unfortunately there are no actions on the that match your search.
replies.out_of_scope: I am sorry, I don't quite understand what you mean. I am only able to help you with spaceship life support.
